ygData.subject: Re: Having troubles...
ygData.msgSnippet: 15-16 Blackburrow.  Killing guardsmen still gives you some exps and you can take elites or commanders one on one, or group for rooms full of them. Lots of
ygData.messageBody:
15-16 Blackburrow. Killing guardsmen still gives you some exps and you
can take elites or commanders one on one, or group for rooms full of
them. Lots of people here, but if you know the zone well, there are
plenty of gnolls for all. Also a good place to bash gnolls and alot
less crowed, is PAW. hard to find solo commanders here, or nobles, but
get 1-2 others of your level and kill rex, or nobles or commanders for
really nice exps/time spent averages.

Chris Benco
Manager of Technical Support X Technology Inc.
Bash@... - (440)498-1222 x111

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tom Swift [SMTP:tswift@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 5:00 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Having troubles...
>
> I am a bit lost as to where I should be hunting right now.
> �
> I have reached level 15, I am almost 16.� I have maxed both dual wield
> and double attack at 80 each.� I seem to be having trouble effectively
> hunting.� Anything that cons white to me is always a tough fight that
> can go either way, so I usually end up sticking to blue critters.�
> However some blue critters are just to tough to solo.� Lava basilisks
> are a no-no because of Stone Breath, fire elementals have some kind of
> damage shield which causes me damage each time I hit so they are a
> no-no also.�� Lavastorm being my preferred hunting area right now.� I
> tried crocs in Oasis, but it is to crowded when I play (8pm-10pm) for
> me to even find anything to kill.
> �
> I guess I am at that awkward level and was looking for advice from
> other warriors on how they got fro 15 to 16.
> �
> Bael
> Warrior of the 15th Order
> Indigo Brotherhood of the Tier'dal
